title: Display,L, Preamble, XL
code:
<gds-flex width="100%" padding="xl; m {5xl}; l {8xl}" flex-direction="column" align-items="center" gap="2xl; m {l}; s {s}">
  <gds-text text-align="center " font="display-s; m {display-m}; l {display-l}">Climate change is the greatest and most urgent challenge.
  </gds-text>
  <gds-text color="neutral-02" text-align="center " font="preamble-s; m {preamble-m}; l {preamble-l}">We have committed to the Paris Agreement by the signing of the UNEP FI Principles for Responsible Banking, and one of the founding signatories of the Net-Zero Banking Alliance and the Net Zero Asset Managers initiative.
  </gds-text>
  <gds-badge variant="notice">2XL (32)</gds-badge>
</gds-flex>
